meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>divide</kanji> and <kanji>untie</kanji> things, you're unraveling the connections between them. In other words, you're doing a <vocabulary>breakdown</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>dismantling</vocabulary> of something.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
